resources.string: In case the transaction number can’t be passed, copy it to the clipboard:
The transaction number has been copied to the clipboard
We’re sorry, no connection could be established. Please check your internet connection and try again.
We’re sorry, your device does not meet the minimum requirements of the current security guidelines. Please update your device and try again.
Secured server connection (SSL) failed. Please try again later or install the most recent version of the app.
A technical error occurred. Please try again later.
Please download the current version of the POSTIDENT app to be able to use all features.
Please download the current version of the POSTIDENT app to be able to use all features.
